1.content: You wake up, a bit dazed. The last thing you remembered was a bright light, than you woke up here. You could't figure out where you were at this point, but something about this place felt familiar. As you inspect yourself for any injuries, you can see that you are......
1.title: Welcome To Jasper Park, Canada.

11.content: Okay, you're a boy, but how old are you?
11.title: A Boy

choices: You're a Feral Wolf...... WAIT!!! A WOLF?!!!
You're an Anthro Wolf...... WAIT!!! A WOLF?!!!
111.content: So we deduced your at the end of your toddler years, by human standards, but when you look at yourself, what else do you see?

1111.content:
Getting up, you hear a crinkling as you move your legs. Looking down, you see the budge in your pants that was no doubt the diaper you were wearing.
You look over to a nearby stream and walk over to it to see your reflection.
To your shock and astonishment, you were still human, just four years old. You look exactly as you did in your parents baby pictures of you.

As you pay close, even too much, attention to the reflection...
1111.title: You're Still Human

11112.content:
At first, it was a snapping of twigs. You stood frozen, still staring at your reflection.
The snapping twigs continued, louder as if someithing was stepping toward your location.
The next you heard were sounds you could only recognize as a wolf.
Scared, as you were only four years old, practically still a baby, you decided to turn to see what was approaching you.
11112.title: You hear a noise nearby

1111211.content:
Coming out to the clearing you were in, much to your surprise, was Kate from Alpha and Omega. At least, you thought that was her name. You couldn’t put your finger on it, but you at least recognized her as Kate.
At least you hoped the brown wolf in front of you was a cartoon character, and not a random wild wolf.

Kate was far, but she began to approach you in a defensive and aggressive manner. “Who are you?” She demanded. “Where did you come from.

You quickly begin to back up but soon lose balance and fall onto your butt, as your four year old body, even with your mind, was still uncoordinated.

Speaking of your body, your reminded of the infantile nature as you landed, feeling a squishy sensation in the seat of your diaper upon landing.
You realize what that was and begin crying, uterly helpless sitting in your own mess.

Kate, upon noticing you in despair, seemingly out of no where, stopped her approach.
“What the?” She asked to her self as she slowly approached you this time to investigate you.

Once she was close enough, you heard her sniffing you. Once she got close enough to your dirty diaper, he quickly recoiled, backing away. “Ugh!” She said in disgust. “You stink!”

All the insult managed to do was make you cry more.

Kate continued to look at you until she...
1111211.title: Kate

11112111.content:
She came closer to you, and pulled you into, what you can only call, a motherly embrace.

Now before we continue,

Is Kate in a Bipedal Anthro form of herself? ( ex: https://i-should-not-exist.deviantart.co... )
Or is she in her quadruped feral form? ( ex: https://nightmisteclipse.deviantart.com/... )
11112111.title: Began to comfort you.

111121111.content:
Kate walked toward you, kneeling down to pick you up.
Once you were in her arms, she began rocking you in an effort to calm you down.
Once she saw you calmed down a little, she then-
111121111.title: Anthro

111121112.content:
The wolf curled herself around you, surrounding you in her warm fur. You couldn’t help but feel safe in her care.
“Don’t cry...” she said softly as she licked the top of your head to calm you down. “What’s wrong?” She asked in a motherly tone, pretending not to notice your dirty diaper.

You try to tell her about how you woke up like this, that you shouldn’t be four years old, and you especially shouldn’t be in diapers, let alone using them. That you had no clue what was going on. That you were scared.

Does she understand you?
111121112.title: Feral.

choices: She says she will help you
1111211121.content:
“You poor thing.” Kate said. She didn’t necessarily have any problem believing your story. It was rare to see a human around here without a trace, let alone a human child.

“You’re lost, aren’t you?” Kate asked, sitting back to get a better look at you.

“I am...” You say, slightly scared.

“Do you want me to help you?” Kate asked. “How can I help you?” She asked with a warm and motherly smile.

You stand up from the ground, noticing the drag from your sagging diaper. You’re scared to ask, but this needed to be taken care of.

“Um...” You begin, embarrassed by your next question... “Can you change my diaper?”

Kate backed up slightly, perplexed at the request.

“Please?”
1111211121.title: Yes

1153.content:
"Ugh...this movie is so dumb..."

You can't help but gripe to yourself as you stare at the large movie theatre screen playing a movie about wolves. You aren't even sure what the plot is about since you didn't pay much attention. Your little brother is watching intently and seems to be enjoying it, but that's a given since he's been excited to see it. That said, you were forced to accompany him as his older brother by your parent. You had to cancel plans with your friends too because of it.

With a sigh, you recline your head down in the lounge chair and amongst the audience with kids and parents alike, you feel yourself slowly drifting to sleep.

-------------------------------------------------------------------

"Jake...Jake!"

"Huh-what?!"

You bolted up, hearing your name called. Then, you froze expecting yourself to still be in the movie theater with your little brother. Instead, you find yourself in a bed of a warm, homely cabin. Lanterns adorned the walls and looking around, there didn't appear to be signs of any electricity.

'Where...am I?'

You start to feel scared and hop down the bed in hopes to either wake up from this possible dream or to find answers. What do you notice first?
1153.title: It begins with a movie...

choices: Take a peek into the bathroom.
Stop. You feel oddly exposed and... (You just noticed you are diapered)
11531.content:
Nothing out of the ordinary with either your stature or your physical form, you begin to look around more on your two feet. You remember hearing a voice calling your name, but nobody is near you.

"Um...hello?" you call out.

"Finally, you're up! Don't you dare go back to bed, young man. I'll be out of the bathroom soon and we'll be on our way."

It's now apparent the voice you heard is a female and based on where it is echoing, she's in the bathroom that is connected to this cabin room. You can see a bit of light peaking through and some sort of form shifting.

'Wait...this voice sounds familiar,' you think, but couldn't place a finger on it.

More importantly, she talks as if you're her son. While that tone could be your strict mother, you know that it's definitely not the case given how different this one sounds.

What do you do?
11531.title: You're still human.

choices: Kate, as you've seen in the movies before.
115312.content:
Before you could take a peek into the bathroom, you notice something very apparent. You were too distracted by the change in setting to notice before, but now moving around, you find yourself nearly naked with diaper on!

"What the hell!?!"

In your surprise, you fumble down to the ground. Your padded bottom isn't enough to stop you from feeling the pain of the wooden flooring, but that's hardly the issue now.

Quickly, the female in the bathroom escapes out of the bathroom hearing the thud in worry. If your current state wasn't enough, you'd soon face another surprise.

"Oh Jake, are you hurt?!"

You look away from the floor to see...
115312.title: You are diapered.

choices: She picks you up with surprising strength.
1153121.content:
Preview: {x-link: https://e621.net/post/show/1233864{/x-link}

The pain from falling down onto your bottom disappears quickly as shock travels through your system. You couldn't believe your eyes as you see an anthropomorphic version of the mother wolf, Kate.

"Oh dear, Jake, are you hurt?" Kate asked, quickly moving towards you with nothing but underwear on her impossibly human-like form. You are too shocked and afraid to move as you stare in disbelief.

What happens?
1153121.title: An anthromorphic version of Kate.

choices: She wakes up before you could try anything.
11531211.content:
"No...way..."

Your eyes roll up, unable to accept the seemingly impossible sight. You hear her voice calling out to you in a panic as you fall to the ground.

-------------------------------------------------

If there was an appropriate time to wake up from a dream, now would be the time. Unfortunately, it seems as if someone had decided to twist your fate.

As your consciousness recovers, you feel a noticeable warmth beneath you and a heartbeat. On top of that, the seeming bed is silky and smooth. Only when your vision recovers do you notice that you are not alone.

Silently gasping, you see that you are lying on top of the wolf who you are still shocked to see. Her appearance doesn't make you pass out twice though, but it does make your heart beat faster.

The anthropomorphic wolf is holding your head to her chest nude with the other hand on your back. She's fast asleep and seems to have held you like this for a while.

Afraid of waking her up, you remain still and stare at her feature's more closely. Although her head is similar to the movie you've seen, that's where it ends. She has a rather voluptuous form, something that not many females can pull off. If you had to say, she's quite beautiful with her golden fur.

That doesn't excuse your current situation though nor does it make you feel safe. You needed answers...why you've appeared with this wolf woman, how she knows you, and why you are in diapers. Considering you are staring at a human-like wolf, you feel that the fact you are in diapers is hardly something you should concern yourself.

What do you do?
11531211.title: You pass out.

115312112.content:
Before you could think further on how you would escape without waking her, you hear her groan softly and slowly open her eyes. You quickly maintain your position and close your eyes, feigning sleep.

She runs her furry hands through your hair, surprising you a little. It actually feels rather nice, but you don't let that get to you too much. Unfortunately, she doesn't believe you are asleep or unconscious.

"My son, I know you are awake," she chuckles, "...let me see your face."

Flinching, you know it's pointless to try to pretend otherwise. Trying to keep calm, you lift your head and as you gaze at her, she cups your cheek.

"I'm glad you are well," she smiles warmly before furrowing her eyebrows in worry, "...still, why did you suddenly pass out? Thanks to you, I had to miss the pack meeting."

"I uh..." you begin, unsure how to respond. You end up gulping, wondering if she's going to get angry at you. Although you want to question why she thinks you're her son, you feel that it might only make her angry.

Seeing how you aren't sure, Kate makes her own assumptions with a sigh. "You are still far too frail. Since you are human, it is not surprising but it means that I can't risk leaving you alone. I thought that I may start allowing you to hunt and eat solids, but there is still a long way to go. I will continue to nurse you as I have done before. Come."

She guides you to her bare chest and this time, you pull back in shock. Your sudden resistance causes her to furrow her brows as you refuse.

"W-what?! I'm sorry, I can't-"

"Young man!" she snaps with a growl, causing you to shut up in an instant. Given she's still a wolf, it's best not to anger her and for a moment there, you nearly forgot.

Her eyes narrow as you submit, "...this is not up for negotiations. As your mother and alpha, I know best. Don't make me grab your father!"

"S-s-sorry," you answer, quivering in place. You can't recall who the father is as you were barely paying attention during the movie.

Carefully eying you for a few seconds, her gaze softens and then she continues guiding your head to her chest.

"Now, suck."

Forced to nurse from her, you utter a small whimper before latching before her left chest. Your face nicely compresses into her large chest.

Her head leans back a little as she sighs. While you attempt to suckle, she brushes through your hair. It doesn't stop you from shaking in the beginning as you are afraid, but over time, you start to calm down.

You aren't sure what wolf's milk is supposed to taste like, but it's a bit sweet and the more you nurse, you find yourself liking it quite a bit. That said, you never expected to end up tasting milk from a wolf, much less one that is anthropomorphic.

After quite some time, she switches you to her other breast. It's there she notices an oddity in your diapers off to the side. Despite being forced into this, suckling at her silky chest is activating a reaction out of you.

How does she respond to this new "development"?
115312112.title: She wakes up before you could try anything.

choices: ...you've made quite a mess and she needs to change you.
1153121121.content:
Somewhere down the line, you already existed as Kate's human "baby", a history you'd like clarification on. While growing hard is not your intention for the wolf anthro, you had to admit that this situation had some appeal.

What you don't know though is that Kate sees your reaction as very normal. Her hand frees itself from your back and crawls underneath your diaper. You aren't able to react until it is too late and her soft furry hands wrap around your cock.

"W-wha-"

You unlatch for a moment but Kate pushes you back and hushes you. "Why are you panicking? This isn't anything new, my son."

She says that so casually, but as far as your memory is concerned, this is out of the blue! Trying hard to match her expectations, you continue drawing milk while she "milks" you. Her hand strokes you like an expect, someone who clearly has stroked you many times over. It makes you wonder how you even got into this role in the first place.

Before long, you cum, all contained into your diaper. Her hand draws away from your padded protection and she licks away some remaining cum on her hand...er paw.

Like cat, she licks it clean and then notices your stares, your mouth hanging loosely on her nipple. She furrows her eyebrows and growls.

"You are acting very strange! Come on, you aren't done yet!"

Quickly, you obey and continue suckling, but the sight of her licking away your cum is much more than you expected.

Within your sticky diaper, Kate sees that...
1153121121.title: She decides to pleasure you.

choices: You start having strange, unfamiliar dreams.
Waking up, Kate brings you to the rest of the pack.
11531211211.content:
Growing hard again, it's hard not to enjoy this despite how unexpected it seems. If she's treating you as if you're her son, then it's even more surprising.

Of course, you're growing hard because it's not like you see her as your mother. As much as you don't want to admit you're into the anthropomorphic, Kate is seeming more and more attractive. Could her milk be affecting you or how she handles you? Maybe both?

Deeply confused as you suckle, Kate sees that you're lower half has returned to its liveliness and into such a short amount of time. She sighs, then stops you from suckling.

"Uh...what?"

Standing up, you wonder if this is the end but before you could say anything, she pulls down the last piece of her lingerie, her panties.

Widening your eyes, you start to babble incoherently, but Kate doesn't heed you. She hops back onto the bed, lies down on her back, then urges you to come over with her hand.

"Come, we're switching positions. Take off your diapers too."

In disbelief, she growls as you stare blankly. Her patience is clearly wearing thin.

"Now!"

You yelp and remove the padded protection, leaving your sticky diaper on the floor. While dripping with pre-cum, you slowly move towards Kate unsure of what she wants to do. Her intentions are very clear though.

"Stick it in, my son and we'll continue your feeding."

Okay, you have to stop there.

"W-wait! I'm...still confused. I-isn't this wrong?"

Although you wanted to avoid looking ignorant, you couldn't look past this. Even the handjob was a bit much if you are to believe your role as her son.

Kate furrows her brows but explains as she starts to worry about your odd behavior so far. "My son...I don't know why you are hesitating, but...if you are worried about your father, then don't. I love him but you are my greatest pride and joy. Since you are very different from the rest of the pack, we've always done this kind of thing. There's no risk in getting me pregnant either but you should know this!"

Your mouth hangs and you have a whole slew of questions. The fact is that you don't have a recollection of anything! You were in a damn movie theater and now, you're experiencing a very non-kid friendly scene.

Yet, it would seem you have to hold those questions and investigate further. Despite her stern personality, she gazes at you with warm loving eyes that are concerned about you.

Biting your lips, you feel obligated to continue playing this role...however strange it may be.

"I'm...sorry mother," you apologize. It feels strange to call her mom, but you try to maintain it for now less things become more difficult for you.

Kate relaxes a bit, then her arm reaches out and cups your cheek. "No, it's my fault, my son. This all started because I failed to protect you. Now, please...let me provide for you as much as I am able."

It seems as if something happened in the past related to you. Another thing to investigate later. For now, you position yourself between her legs. She gently guides you to her crotch and in no time...

"O-oh..."

You let out a small gasp. As much as you should feel excited, you also feel ashamed. Why? Because you were still a virgin and now, you've lost your virginity to an anthro wolf of all things.

Technically, it sounds as if you lost your virginity in this reality a while ago, but as far as you know, this will be your first time.

But, you don't complain since wallowing in regret will only make your mother mad. She wraps her hand around your back and you are guided to her chest. Slowly, you move your hips, thrusting in small amounts into her.

Kate breathes out and rubs your back as you gently fuck her and nurse from her. You haven't noticed it until now, but she must be at least a foot or two taller than you because you are able to lie on top of her and rest your head on her chest without trying to perform any aching adjustment.

Kate pants like a happy dog which sounds a little amusing to you. Her moans feel like a lullaby to your ears and it spurs you to keep going and last long.

Milk splurts into your mouth like a fountain thanks to Kate being inflamed by you. You try to keep up with the seemingly increase in milk production. Your hands travel down from her sides which induces further moans from her.

"Yes...my baby. My sweet, sweet human foul."

Her words only encourage you and for what feels like hours, you remain on top of her, nursing calmly when you libido is down and then ravishing her to no end when it is up and like still drinking her wolf milk.

Somewhere down the line though, you've exhausted yourself and fall asleep while Kate holds you back to sleep.

What happens?
11531211211.title: Kate relieves you again.

choices: In a village with other transformed animals like her.
On a hill being the lone house.
115312112111.content:
As you sleep, you wonder how you were transferred into this twisted predicament but the answers come only to make you feel more confused.

"Over there, I hear someone crying!"

Standing in the midst of a snow-filled valley, you stare dazed before coming to realize you're in a different land. Before you could question, you see a pack of wolves heading straight towards you!

"A-ah!"

Frozen, you could only gasp with no time to escape; however, instead of being jumped and devoured, the pack ran straight past you without giving you any heed.

Shivering, not because you felt cold, but thinking that you were a goner, you hesitantly turned to look into the direction of the wolves who were growing distant in their sprint.

"Wait a minute..."

As the snow fell and touched your skin, you begin to notice strange details. One, you're completely nude and somehow you don't feel embarrassed either. Second, you don't feel cold.

In fact, standing around, you feel a great disconnect.

'I'm...in a dream? For real, this time?'

You could only believe so and this time wondered whether being held and making love to the anthropomorphic wolf before who thought to be your mother was a dream as well.

For now, you still aren't sure of anything, but figure you shouldn't just wake up now that you are aware that you're in some sort of dream. It occurs to you that you could have sworn you saw the protagonists of the wolf movie, Kate and Humphrey in the midst of the pack that ran by you. They were also actually looking like wolves instead of a humanized one.

Deciding to follow the pack, you found you didn't have to travel far and time also seemed to move quickly as you reached the sight of the pack without thinking.

You felt an odd sensation as the pack surrounded a basket and arguments were thrown around between the pack members. Even though they're wolves, you could still hear what they had to say in English.

"This has nothing to do with us! Someone abandoned this baby and it's not our problem!"

"How can you say that? If this were a wolf pup, would you say the same thing?"

"The poor thing isn't going to last long and it seems to be hungry. Even if we try to take it with us, it might not survive anyway."

Creeping closer to the pack, you see they are all arguing over the baby who was weakly gasping, unable to even cry out. The more you stared at the child, you felt a connection to it.

"That's...me, isn't it?"

Although nobody answered, you felt it to be true. Through the barking and your own line of thinking, someone finally barked the loudest.

"Enough! I personally will take care of the child and claim responsibility!"

The voice belongs to the one who appeared before you except she was still a wolf. Kate pushed through the wolves towards the child who were shocked by their Alpha's decision.

Humphrey quickly joined her side. While he supported the care for the care of the child, he also knew that they might not be able to save it.

"Kate, are you sure? While I feel this is the right decision, how can we take care of him? He needs food and water and if we try to carry him, it'll only make him worse I feel."

Kate's muzzle twisted into a frown and her eyes lowered in thought. "I...have to try. If I don't...how can I trust myself with our own children?"

"...Kate..."

Knowing that when Kate had made her decision, she would follow it to the end and so Humphrey didn't question it anymore as the female wolf crept closer to the baby.

Your baby self whimpered, showing it was scared but Kate let out a soft hush and tried to comfort it.

"Child, don't worry. I will take full responsibility for you. If only...I knew how to properly nurture you back to health..."

As if answering, a gust of wind blew around Kate causing some snow to glitter around her. Then, all of the pack members began to slowly step back as they opened their mouth in disbelief.

It took mere seconds, a change occurred to Kate without warning or beyond her notice. It only took a blink for members of the pack to see Kate in her wolf form before a humanized version appeared in her place.

Kate felt something was off when she felt herself grow suddenly taller after leaning away from the child. Before recognizing her own changes, she looks at everyone curiously.

"What's wrong?"

--------------------------------------------------------------------

"Child, wake up."

Your own shock in the dream transferred over to the present when you open your eyes and gasped. Returning to the logwood surroundings, you see Kate leaning over you on the bedside and changing your crotch with a new diaper, a combination of cloth and leaves to be precise.

You are at a sudden loss of words but come to the conclusion that you definitely are not in a dream and somehow, you've been transferred to this strange reality based off the movie you watched. Only, if you were to believe your dream, it seems the history of your presence has changed things for the Alpha.

It's clear now though that she's different from the wolves unless there were others that transformed as well just as sudden as she did once she made it her responsibility to take care of you.

"Um..."

You hesitate and just as Kate finishes cleaning you up, she sees that you want to say something. "What is it, my son?"

Now understanding that somehow, you've been adopted by her, you feel a little more comfortable addressing her as mom, even if you only do so given your current role.

"M-mom then, d-do you ever wonder why you...um...transformed?"

Showing her surprise by your question, she chuckles and rubs your belly, much to your embarrassment. "It's because of nature, my son. Thanks to my given form, I'm able to care for you which I would not have been if I were still a wolf."

"I...I see."

Perhaps there is some sort of higher being that exists in this reality. If such a being could transform a wolf, perhaps its that same being that transferred your consciousness here.

Based on the dream which you believed to be a memory, you wonder if you simply possessed the body of a different version of yourself.

You've read too many fantasy and SciFi novels, so you could come up with some sort of illogical explanation as to your current circumstances.

Seeing you deep in thought, Kate chuckled and shook her head silly. "There is much work to do, so you can tell me your thoughts later. Come."

Reminded of her strength as she picks you up, you simply flinch but prevent yourself from gasping. It seemed "nature" has provided her the strength to ensure she could keep you close to her, even as you grow older.

Despite her strength though, you still couldn't help feeling scared that she might drop you which wouldn't be good, especially since she's at least 7 or 8 feet tall. Thus, you react by wrapping your legs around her waistline and your arms around her back.

Kate hums, squeezing you for a bit and feeling happy that you're with her. Given your height to chest as she holds you up, she's able to bury your face into one of her large fur breasts and you can only latch on, drawing sweet milk.

"Let's go visit our pack," she declared, leaving the bedroom.

Where do you find yourself outside?
115312112111.title: You start having strange, unfamiliar dreams.

info.brief_description: You awake In Jasper Park Canada. Home to Kate and Humphrey, the Alpha and the Omega.
info.description:
You have awoken and found yourself in the world of Jasper Park, Canada. Home of Kate and Humphrey, the Alpha and Omega who fell in love with each other. A lot can happen while you are here. Perhaps you'll be a snack for one of the wolves. Perhaps you'll be taken in as one of the pack members. Maybe you've transformed, maybe you're still human. Maybe your an adult, a teen, or a little child. Maybe you shrank. Maybe you're normal size.... for a human. Let's see where events take us. Have fun.

Oh, before you do, some ground rules must be established. And do not email me here or off sight to request changes an exception for one scenario to these rules. Anyone who breaks these rules will have their chapters deleted.

Rules are as follows.

What "is" allowed:
Soft Vore (Oral, Anal (no scat), Tail, Breast, etc.)
Unbirth
Breastfeeding
Age Regression
Transformation (Do not make the transformation a painful scene.)
Diapers. (Be very light on the mention of diaper usage, and no description on what it looks like if the character is getting a diaper change.
Anthro Version of Characters.
Death of Villains, like King, but don't go into detail.
Sex Scenes, but only with adults, be they characters from the movie together in a "meanwhile" scene, or the main character is adult and having sex with one of the characters. And it has to be both sides consent.
Babying
Nudity for both Anthro and Human Main Character. (but not for sexual reasons, should you go child main character route.)

What is "not" allowed:
Death of Main Character. (This includes any scenarios where he's killed and revived right after, such as being digested in one of the characters stomachs.)
Rape
Children Characters in sexual scenes (excluding being unbirthed). That includes the main character, if they are also a child. (And no "has adult mind but child body" to be used as a scapegoat.)
Hard Vore
Blood
Gore
Scat
Abuse
Slavery
Inflicting Pain
Receiving Pain

If there are any scenarios you are unsure about that were not listed, and/or have questions about, please email me, and I will let you know if I accept the idea in the story or not. Help me get at least 50 chapters up. Other than that, like I said before, have fun.
